mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (userNo, invitedEmails, title, isRegular, regularType, description, startDate, endDate, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{invitedEmails, typeHandler=com.commit.collaboration_board_server.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{title}, #{isRegular}, #{regularType}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET userNo = #{userNo}, invitedEmails = #{invitedEmails, typeHandler=com.commit.collaboration_board_server.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, title = #{title}, isRegular = #{isRegular}, regularType = #{regularType}, description = #{description}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE scheduleType = 'weekly' AND startDate > NOW()
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE scheduleType = 'monthly' AND startDate > NOW()
